name: Bot.exe
description:
A Puzzle Game where you have to program your bot to make it to the exit of the room, without getting caught.

Use "WASD" and "SPACE" to add commands to the command line

Use right arrow and left arrow to navigate on the command line

If you get spotted, the alarm is triggered. Now enemies will kill you, cameras are deactivated, but lasers are activated. 

Use "K" to skip level and "J" to go back to the previous level.

Use end to jump to the of the command line and home to jump to the first position of the command line.
